room_title: Escape room "A Dream" by Escape Room Kansas City in Kansas City
review: Had an awesome time escaping from the Dream room!! Definitely will be back to try others, so much fun!

room_title: Escape room "A Dream" by Escape Room Kansas City in Kansas City
review: We loved our first visit! We took our kids (14 & 10) and chose "A Dream" because we thought it was the easiest. When we arrived, they told us it was actually the hardest. They were not joking! Would we have known that, we would have booked a different room (being with our children) but we still had a great time. We will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "A Dream" by Escape Room Kansas City in Kansas City
review: A great date night activity! We did the dream room and it really stretched our critical thinking skills. There were only two of us to escape the room.
